ej,mccll001,C,bellw901,Bench-clearing brawl $Javier Vazquez took a swipe at the glove of 3B Aramis Ramirez at the end of the rundown; both benches emptied as the two players yelled at each other; Pirates coach Lloyd McClendon ejected by 1B umpire Wally Bell1998MON.EVN.regular.comment.csv"

ej,vazqj001,P,nauep901,Intentional HBP ej,ramia001,P,nauep901,Charging mound after HBP $Aramis Ramirez charged the mound and threw his helmet at pitcher Javier Vazquez after being HBP; the helmet missed; both benches emptied as Vazquez threw a wild punch at Ramirez and missed; both players were ejected by HP umpire Paul Nauert1998MON.EVN.regular.comment.csv"
